name: Vec2D
description: The `Vec2D` class represents a 2D vector defined by two points in 2D space - a start point (x1, y1) and an end point (x2, y2). This class provides comprehensive mathematical operations for vector manipulation, including addition, multiplication, scaling, dot product calculation, magnitude computation, and normalization. It's commonly used for 2D mathematical calculations, physics simulations, direction calculations, and spatial reasoning in scripts.
overview:
The `Vec2D` class provides essential 2D vector mathematics functionality:

- **Vector Representation:** Defined by start and end points for precise spatial relationships
- **Mathematical Operations:** Addition, multiplication, scaling, and dot product calculations
- **Magnitude Operations:** Calculate vector length and squared magnitude for performance
- **Direction Operations:** Reverse vectors and normalize to unit vectors
- **Conversion Support:** Convert to 3D vectors and string representations
- **Comparison Support:** Full equality, hashing, and comparison capabilities

constructors.description: Creates a new Vec2D with specified start and end coordinates.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the start point

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the start point

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the end point

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the end point

constructors.description: Creates a new Vec2D from two Pos2D points.
